main event: An unusual object was observed traveling in an easterly direction at high speed near Point Mugu, California on 28 January 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed after a jet aircraft disappeared from sight., It was concluded that the object was not a conventional aircraft., Observers noted the object traveled at a speed greater than that of the jet., The sighting lasted for about 6 minutes., The conclusion of the observation was that the object was unidentified.
witnesses: members of a boat crew observing military operations
